prompts.name: dog-walker-prompt
prompts.description: A prompt for scheduling dog walks with Bella and Dora

versions.template: Schedule a walk for Bella and Dora at {{time}} in {{location}}.
Hi {{owner}}! Time to walk Bella and Dora at {{time}}. Meeting point: {{location}}. Don't forget the treats!
